item.title: Babygame01
item.description: Baby Game Link to heading For this challenge we are given a game to play Moving to the X in the bottom right informs us that “You win!” and exits the program. This does not give us the flag so lets have a poke around in ghidra. In the main function we can see we get the flag if local_aa4 is != ‘\0’. which is a local variable placed on the stack before a large buffer (local_aa0).
